feed.title: Combined summary - Mimblewimble: non-interactive coinjoin, signature aggregation and confidential transactions

entry.title: Combined summary - Mimblewimble: non-interactive coinjoin, signature aggregation and confidential transactions
entry.summary: A document discussing Mimblewimble, non-interactive coinjoin and better Bitcoin privacy has been found on wizards, with links to two different websites, one of which was authored by Bryan. These topics have been analyzed and discussed in online forums such as Bitcoin Wizards and Reddit. Additionally, Bryan's website offers further information on the same subjects.
